title: Peak online shopping hours of U.S. consumers 2015
summary: shopping gaming is no longer a hobby exclusively enjoyed by the young .
As generations have grown up with shopping games a normal part of life , the Peak of the average gamer also increases .
While 48 % of shopping hours U.S. still come from the 7-11_AM to 11_AM_-_4_PM Peak demographic , some 14 % are 9_PM_-_2_AM 7-11_AM and 9_PM_-_2_AM .
gold: This statistic presents the preferred time of the day for consumers in the United States to shop online.
During the April 2015 survey , 48 percent of survey respondents stated that their peak online shopping hours were between 4 and 9 PM .
